Description:
Rare opportunity - 6 individually titled units!
This rare opportunity to purchase a set of six units on approximately 1213sqm presents the successful buyer with the ability to secure their financial future! Individually titled and metered, the generous 1-bedroom units offer strong rental returns. Each property features spacious open plan living and functional kitchen layout with upright stove and breakfast bar overlooking a private courtyard. A combined bathroom/laundry with courtyard access and carport provides added convenience. Superbly located within walking distance of shops, parkland and public transport, and easy access to the Ring Road make this windfall yours!
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Large land and ideal location.
Capitalise on the wonderful opportunity to purchase this great first home or investment that boasts plenty of appeal for the Melbourne commuter with the Princes Highway close by. Perfectly suited for an array of purchasers, if you're searching for a first home to add your own style, families looking for a generous rear yard or investors wanting a set and forget property with potential for future growth and scope for sub-division (STCA). Comprising of a generous lounge upon entry with a gas heater, the property offers 3 sizeable bedrooms, a neat central bathroom, laundry and a spacious kitchen complete with gas cooking & meals area. Outside you're sure to be impressed by the extensive rear yard, fully fenced with an ample side driveway all situated on a lavish 702m2 (approx.) allotment. Public transport is available nearby, with close proximity to multiple reserves, Corio Shopping Centre and Geelong's Ring Road, location is ideal. Don't delay, inspections are a must for this charming home
Insights: 23 Ontario Avenue, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Take Advantage of This Well Presented Home!
Welcome to this stunning home! If you are looking for an immaculate property with all the hard work done look no further! Boasting 3 large bedrooms, two with BIR's & 3rd bedroom can be occupied as a second living space, opportunities abound.
Modern kitchen with dishwasher & plenty of cupboard space, newly renovated bathroom, polished floorboards, down lights throughout, gas wall heater & two split systems make this home feel incredible comfortable all year round.
You will love having a tandem double garage & north facing sunroom perfect for all seasons.
With all amenities at your doorstep including popular schools, childcare, major shopping outlets, sporting facilities & ring road access this newly renovated property in the heart of Corio is a must inspect. Take this opportunity & purchase today!

Description:
Property with plenty of potential.
You won't be disappointed with the stunning updates of this neat 2 bedroom home. Investors, developers and first home buyers will appreciate the location & size of this bright and appealing property representing outstanding value for any purchaser. Comprising of a generous lounge upon entry complete with gas heater and air conditioner and floorboards that continue through to the 2 generous sized bedrooms both featuring BIRs. The updated kitchen provides gas cooking and room for a meals area. Situated on an extensive 696m2 approx. parcel of land the backyard provides an abundance of space, a blank canvas perfect for the new owner of this charming property to utilise as they see fit and potentially sub-divide (STCA). Ideal location just minutes to the Corio train station with public transport just down the road and Corio Shopping Centre not far away. Easy access to the Geelong Ring Road and Geelong's CBD just a 10 minute drive down Princes Highway the home is within easy reach to all major amenities. Invest with the best and enquire now to secure this outstanding home today.
Insights: 239 Princes Highway, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2020 and 13 other 2 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Generous family home on a 797m2 (approx.) allotment.
This much loved, brick veneer family home contains an astounding amount of features and has been superbly renovated inside and out to cater for those who have a passion for entertaining. Ideal for first home buyers or savvy investors this stunning property sitting on a lavish 797m2 (approx.) corner allotment is sure to grab your attention. Offering 3 bedroom in total all with BIR's, while at the centre you'll find an open planed meals, living and kitchen area. The central bathroom has been restructured to include a separate bath and shower as well as ample room for a laundry area. Securely fenced all the way around the exterior of the property presenting multiple areas for the whole family to enjoy. Stepping out from the rear door you'll be greeted by an undercover decked alfresco that provides access to a built in spa area and secure above ground pool space. Off street parking is available in the SLUG that has an excellent rumpus room complete with sliding doors and bar attached to the rear. An additional bungalow is perfect for extra storage, a teenagers retreat or potential 4th bedroom if required. Situated in an established neighbourhood the home allows easy access to Public transport which is located on Plantation Road and is just a short commute to the Corio train station. With only a 2 minute drive to further amenities such as Corio Shopping Centre, Shell reserve and quality schools for all ages this property is in prime position. Inspections are a must to appreciate all the detailed aspects the home possess, don't delay as this is truly a one-of-a-kind opportunity.
Photo ID Required
Insights: 11-15 Kalver Street, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
"Entertainers Dream!"
Located in the exclusive Rose Park Estate is this impressive home that will certainly delight any family that loves to entertain inside and out. Situated on a huge corner allotment of 696sqm (approx) and providing great side access for a boat or caravan. The home itself offers spacious living with 4 bedrooms, study, 2 living areas, amazing alfresco, inground solar heated pool with lots of room leftover to play ball games. Easy access to the Geelong Ring Road & Corio Shopping Centre just a short commute away and all major amenities are close at hand. Must see as there are too many features to mention. Don't miss your chance to secure this incredible lifestyle opportunity!
- 4 Bedrooms, main with ensuite & WIR
- Spacious Study or 5th Bedroom
- 2 living zones
- Near new kitchen with gas cooking, WIP & stone benchtops
- Central heating, evaporative cooling & reverse cycle a/c
- Ceiling fans in all bedrooms
- Double garage with internal access
- Enormous decked alfresco with bifold doors
- Inground solar heated pool
- Garden shed & side access
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
A golden opportunity.
Don't wait too long to inspect this conveniently located home and decide to make it your own. Situated on a large 542m2 (approx.) parcel of land this neat brick home is perfect for first home buyers looking for a project to rejuvenate and add their own touch to or investors searching for a neat 4 bedroom property to add to their portfolio. The home incorporates a large open planned lounge and dining area upon entry featuring exposed beams, high ceiling and wood heater in the corner. The spacious kitchen offers ample bench space as well as breakfast bench & allows access into the large master bedroom. 3 further bedrooms with BIR's are found down the hallway close by to the laundry and central bathroom. Outside there's an undercover pergola and a substantial rear yard. Easy access to the Princes Highway means just a 10 minute drive to Geelong's CBD or ideal for Melbourne commuters. The home is located close by to public transport and just a few minutes to the Corio train station. Packed full of potential this comfortable family home is one not to be missed.

Description:
Development Ready
Zoned General Residential Schedule 1 on 8.972 hectares (22.17 acres) ready for you to work out your masterplan (stca).
This vast crown allotment has yet to be titled and is Stamp Duty Exempt!
In one of Australia's fastest growing suburbs in one the fastest growing cities.
Adjoining the contemporary & popular residential estate, Rosepark, this is first-rate residential land and a prime development site.
Offering easy access to services and amenities with an impressive list close by:
Aldi - 185 metres plus more shops within 500 metres, Major Shopping Centre 2 kilometres approx.
Highway access - 300 metres
Walking/Riding Tracks - within 200 metres
Public Transport - 300 metres to bus stop and 1.2 kilometres to the Train Station
Schools - within 1 kilometre
Geelong CBD & Acclaimed Waterfront Precinct is less than 15 minutes by car & Avalon Airport less than 15 minutes by car
Melbourne 64.2 km via Princess Hwy - 51 min by car
A rare ready opportunity not to be missed.

Corio's delight.
This delightful property offers purchasers a chance to secure a spacious 3 bedroom home on an allotment of approx. 583m2 in one of Corio's most sought after locations!
Comprising 3 carpeted bedrooms, central bathroom including a separate bath and shower, tiled open plan kitchen with a joined lounge area. Featuring split system air conditioning, gas wall heater and plenty of cupboard and bench space. The rear yard offers a single garden shed and a large grassed area with loads of potential. Located within 5 minutes drive to the Corio Shopping Centre, public transport, local schools and just a 10 minute drive to the Geelong CBD and 50 minutes to Melbourne.
Don't miss the opportunity to inspect this property!

Description:
Immaculate family home or investment.
Set on approx. 530m2 in one of Corio's most convenient locations, this bricked rendered home will be what most home buyers are looking for.
Comprising: 3 generous bedrooms (2 with BIR's), open kitchen/meals with adjoining living room and large central bathroom. Featuring: Beautifully polished timber floors, split system air conditioning, double garage and large yard space.
Situated in close proximity to public transport, local schools, Corio Shopping Centre and with the Geelong Ring Road only a short drive away, everything is close by. No matter what your reason is for purchasing a home, this property has it all for owners, occupiers and investors alike. Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity!

Description:
Great value family home in a great location.
This delightful property offers purchasers a chance to secure an immaculately presented 3 bedroom home on a generous allotment of approx. 697m2 in one of Corio's most sought after locations!
Comprising 3 carpeted bedrooms, central bathroom including a separate bath and shower, spacious tiled lounge upon entry, open dining/kitchen and tandem garage with single carport.
Featuring near new split system air conditioning, gas wall heater, plenty of cupboard and bench space in the kitchen. The rear yard itself offers an abundance of space with a separate bungalow out the back and a garden shed. Most of the house was painted along with a new HWS and new fences in 2017, this offers any buyer piece of mind when buying.
Located within walking distance to the Corio Shopping Centre, public transport, local schools and just a 10 minute drive to the Geelong CBD and 50 minutes to Melbourne.
Don't miss the opportunity to inspect this property!

Description:
Best Kept Secret on 896sqm!
A great home, investment or development opportunity awaits the successful buyer! Set on an impressive 896sqm, the existing property features 3 bedrooms with built-in-robes and a contemporary bathroom with separate shower and bath. Combining original and modern touches, this family home boasts three living zones including lounge, dining and living rooms. An updated kitchen offers ample bench space, breakfast bar, upright oven and stove. Additional highlights include air conditioning, gas heating and rear deck which is an ideal entertainment space, while the enormous backyard is secure ensuring comfort and privacy. A large single garage with workshop completes the home. Situated within walking distance to schools, shops, Corio Village and just a couple of turns and you're on the Ring Road. Act now to secure your future today!
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
